Description: FRagment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with anchor symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Lysion. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0372.17.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (177)
